data.title: FelixHoffmannDesign
data.meta_description: .. Forming Innovation, Shaping Tomorrow My mission is to create unique and tailored design solutions that not only meet your needs but also exceed your expectations Felix Hoffmann is an award winning designer that uses modern tools, rapid prototyping and flat hierarchies to enable fast, agile and precise work for and with his clients. Felix […]
data.text:
In collaboration with Phillip Wildner

Meet Stephan, the modular bike light designed to revolutionize your cycling experience. With its innovative bayonet mount system and a wide range of accessories, Stephan is not just a bike light; it’s your partner for safer and more enjoyable rides, day or night.

Stephan’s bayonet mount is the key to its effortless attachment to your bike. Say goodbye to complicated installations and shaky fixtures. With a simple twist and click, Stephan securely locks into place, ensuring it stays put even during the most rugged rides.

Stephan is a true two-in-one solution. Its modular design allows you to use it both as a front and rear light. Whether you need to illuminate the road ahead or make yourself visible from behind, Stephan has you covered. Stephan doesn’t compromise on brightness or safety. Its high-intensity LED lights ensure you’re visible to others on the road, while the adjustable beam angle lets you tailor the illumination to your specific riding conditions.

But that’s not all – Stephan comes with a range of customizable accessories. In addition to several holders for attaching the lamp to the bike itself, a handle was also designed for use as a flashlight and a clip for attaching the light, for example when jogging or on a stroller.

Introducing the epitome of elegance and practicality: the High-Quality Foldable Bowl crafted from premium stainless spring steel, adorned with exquisite accents of rich olive wood. This remarkable piece of culinary craftsmanship seamlessly combines aesthetics and functionality to elevate your dining experience.

The foundation of this foldable bowl is precision-engineered from the finest stainless spring steel, renowned for its durability, resilience, and rust-resistant properties.

Complementing this steel masterpiece are captivating accents made from sustainably sourced olive wood. The subtle, swirling grain patterns of olive wood bring warmth and a touch of nature to the bowl’s design, creating a harmonious fusion of contemporary design and rustic charm. The olive wood accents are artfully integrated into the bowl’s exterior, adding depth and character to the overall aesthetic.

A true marvel of design, this bowl is ingeniously foldable, allowing for versatile use and easy storage. With a gentle press at its sides, the bowl effortlessly collapses into a flat, compact shape, making it ideal for both space-conscious kitchens and outdoor adventures. Its foldable design ensures that it can be effortlessly stowed away when not in use, yet expands gracefully to serve your culinary needs.

Cleaning this exquisite piece is a breeze. The stainless spring steel is inherently easy to wipe clean, while the olive wood accents can be maintained with a simple application of food-safe wood conditioner or oil, preserving their lustrous appearance for years to come.

Incorporate this High-Quality Foldable Bowl with accents of olive wood into your culinary repertoire, and you’ll discover an exquisite blend of form and function. Its durable construction, elegant design, and foldable convenience make it an indispensable addition to any kitchen, a timeless piece that brings nature’s beauty to your dining table. Elevate your dining experience and make a lasting impression with this captivating fusion of stainless steel and olive wood craftsmanship.
